snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average flirts with the 17,000 milestone as the third quarter begins.
abstract: Stock market rallies to new highs, with Dow Jones industrial average flirting with 17,000.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average flirts with the 17,000 milestone as the third quarter begins.

headline.main: Wall Street Climbs to New Heights as the Dow Nears 17,000
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Climbs to New Heights as the Dow Nears 17,000
